posts.name: Cardiac Imaging
posts.subtitle: ECG
posts.description: ECG is used for recording the small electric waves being generated during heart activity, a simple way of diagnosing heart conditions. In Padma Diagnostic Centre Limited we use Nihon Khoden Cardiofax 1350K for ECG.

posts.name: Radiology Services
posts.subtitle: X-Ray
posts.description: X-rays provide imaging for diagnosing fractures, infections, and other internal conditions. Our center uses the latest Siemens DR System for high-quality imaging.

posts.name: Laboratory Services
posts.subtitle: Blood Test
posts.description: Comprehensive blood tests for diagnostic and health assessment purposes. We use state-of-the-art equipment for accurate results.

posts.name: Dental Care
posts.subtitle: Dental X-Ray
posts.description: Dental X-rays help in the diagnosis of oral conditions like cavities, gum disease, and jaw issues. High-resolution digital imaging ensures minimal radiation.

posts.name: Diagnostic Imaging
posts.subtitle: MRI
posts.description: MRI scans provide detailed imaging of organs and tissues, aiding in the diagnosis of complex conditions. We utilize Philips Ingenia 1.5T for superior results.

posts.name: Ultrasound Services
posts.subtitle: Obstetric Ultrasound
posts.description: Advanced obstetric ultrasound services for prenatal care, ensuring accurate and detailed fetal imaging. We use the GE Voluson series for clarity and safety.

posts.name: Oncology Services
posts.subtitle: Chemotherapy
posts.description: Comprehensive chemotherapy services provided by experienced oncologists. Safe and hygienic infusion treatments for cancer management.

posts.name: Ophthalmology
posts.subtitle: Vision Screening
posts.description: Detailed vision screening for detecting refractive errors, glaucoma, and other eye conditions. Advanced diagnostic tools ensure precision.
